Root.Name: Project
Demoder's PlanetMap Viewer
Root.Tagline: See ingame maps outside the game - With character tracking!
Root.Description: Demoder's PlanetMap Viewer lets you explore planet maps for Anarchy Online without logging in. If you are logged in to the game, it will plot your character(s) on the planet map.[br] The long-term goal is to be a full substitute to the ingame planetmap viewer.[br][br] [b]Features[/b][br] - Plot character marker on planet map for all locally running AO clients[br] - Smart camera tracking of multiple (selectable) characters[br] - See LCA information on the planetmap using the TowerStatus plugin![br] [br][b]Overlay mode[/b] (F12)[br] [ulist] [*]Window will remain on top of other windows, such as Anarchy Online [*]Minimal footprint on screen real estate [*]An extensive menu becomes available upon right-click of the title bar [/ulist] [br] [b]Fullscreen mode[/b] (F11)[br] [ulist] [*]Optimal for running on a dedicated display [*]Window is maximized [*]Borders are removed [/ulist]

Pages.Page: [b]Overlay mode fails to stay on top of Anarchy Online[/b][br] There's a workaround available. Open the options dialog (File->Options) and enable the "Force on top (bugfix)" checkbox.[br]

Created by Demoder (demoder -at- demoder.me)[br] See http://demoder.me/pmv/ for more information.[br] [br] [b]Map plotting algorithm[/b][br] Thanks to Vhab for turning a huge amount of data points into a formula which is useable to do accurate plotting on the map.[br] Also thanks to Niniko for providing documentation on some of the concepts involved in this process.[br] [br] [b]Icon[/b][br] Thanks to Vhab for creating the icon, and to Onack for giving permission to use AoRK for icon generation.[br] [br] [b]Testing[/b][br] Thanks to Iriche, Jandorith, Nesual, Onack, Phooy and Vhab for extensive testing.[br]

[b]Default plugins[/b][br] [b]CharacterLocator[/b][br] Description: Draws character name & locator on map.[br] Configurable: Yes[br] [br][b]Tutorial[/b][br] Description: Introduces the user to the graphical user interface.[br] Configurable: No[br] [br][b]TowerStatus[/b][br] Description: Draws LCA ownership information on the map, and optionally displays recent attacks in the GUI. Configurable: Yes[br]
